thread.section_title: Pavillon Nation - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unpleasant staff and unexpected fee
thread.title_full: Unpleasant staff and unexpected fee - Review of Pavillon Nation, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TheLetmefly
title: Unpleasant staff and unexpected fee
text:
We were supposed to receive a little bottle of "brut" as welcome gift. Unfortunately we had to pay it. Wen we complained the staff member started to be unrespectful
toward us.
Didn't feel very confortable during night because the door knob was damaged.
Beside of all this it location is nice because close to a supermarket and the metro station as well.
